briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for Light Lightness Control Server with custom regulator.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Light Lightness Server model this server controls.
Pointer to the Illuminance regulator to use.

briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for Light Lightness Control Server.

detaileddescription.para: This will enable the specification-defined regulator if embed:rst:inline :kconfig:option:`CONFIG_BT_MESH_LIGHT_CTRL_SRV_REG` and embed:rst:inline :kconfig:option:`CONFIG_BT_MESH_LIGHT_CTRL_REG_SPEC` are selected.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Light Lightness Server model this server controls.

memberdef.name: BT_MESH_MODEL_LIGHT_CTRL_SRV
memberdef.initializer: BT_MESH_MODEL_ONOFF_SRV(&(_srv)->onoff), \ BT_MESH_MODEL_CB(BT_MESH_MODEL_ID_LIGHT_LC_SRV, \ _bt_mesh_light_ctrl_srv_op, &(_srv)->pub, \ BT_MESH_MODEL_USER_DATA( \ struct bt_mesh_light_ctrl_srv, _srv), \ &_bt_mesh_light_ctrl_srv_cb), \ BT_MESH_MODEL_CB(BT_MESH_MODEL_ID_LIGHT_LC_SETUPSRV, \ _bt_mesh_light_ctrl_setup_srv_op, \ &(_srv)->setup_pub, \ BT_MESH_MODEL_USER_DATA( \ struct bt_mesh_light_ctrl_srv, _srv), \ &_bt_mesh_light_ctrl_setup_srv_cb)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Light Lightness Control Server instance.

detaileddescription.para: Instructs the controlled Lightness Server to turn the light on. If the light was already on, the dimming timeout is reset. If the light was in the Prolong state, it's moved back into the On state.

parameterdescription.para: Light Lightness Control Server instance.
The Light Lightness Control Server was successfully turned on.
The Light Lightness Control Server is disabled.

detaileddescription.para: Instructs the controlled Lightness Server to turn the light off (Standby state). Calling this function temporarily disables occupancy sensor triggering (referred to as "manual mode" in the documentation). The server will remain in manual mode until the manual mode timer expires, see embed:rst:inline :kconfig:option:`CONFIG_BT_MESH_LIGHT_CTRL_SRV_TIME_MANUAL` .

parameterdescription.para: Light Lightness Control Server instance.
The Light Lightness Control Server was successfully turned off.
The Light Lightness Control Server is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Enable the Light Lightness Control Server.

detaileddescription.para: The Server must be enabled to take control of the Lightness Server.

parameterdescription.para: Light Lightness Control Server instance.
The Light Lightness Control Server was successfully enabled.
The Light Lightness Control Server was already enabled.

briefdescription.para: Disable the Light Lightness Control Server.

detaileddescription.para: The server must be enabled to take control of the Lightness Server. Disabling the server disengages the control over the Lightness Server, which will start running as an independent model.

parameterdescription.para: Light Lightness Control Server instance.
The Light Lightness Control Server was successfully enabled.
The Light Lightness Control Server was already enabled.

briefdescription.para: Check if the Light Lightness Control Server has turned the light on.

parameterdescription.para: Light Lightness Control Server instance.

simplesect.para: true if the Lightness Server's light is on because of its binding with the Light Lightness Control Server, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: Light Lightness Control Server instance.
Message context, or NULL to publish with the configured parameters.

simplesect.para: 0 Successfully published the current Light state.

parameterdescription.para: A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
